profile.name: Chris Banes
profile.headline: Android Engineer | Delivering high-quality mobile applications with Kotlin and Go
profile.summary: Highly motivated Android engineer with a passion for multiplatform development, database sharding, and open-source contributions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
description: Designed and developed multiple Android applications using Kotlin and Go.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time.
Improved code quality through static code analysis tools and Compose-driven architecture.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple Android applications using Kotlin for various clients.
Contributed to open-source projects, including Kotlin Multiplatform development documentation.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and contributed to multiple open-source projects, including Compose-driven architecture.
Improved code quality through static code analysis tools.
